name: Cauli Kebabs

ingredients.name: Fajita Seasoning or Shish Kebab Seasoning

preparation: Chop cauliflower into small pieces. Place in Multipurpose Steamer; cover and microwave on high for 2 min.
Uncover; drizzle with 2 tbsp oil and seasoning. Stir to coat.
Thread onto 12" metal skewers. Grill for 6â€“8 min, or until lightly charred.
Meanwhile, in bowl, stir together dry glaze, jelly, soy sauce, and 1 tbsp oil.
Place skewers onto a large platter; drizzle with sauce and sprinkle with toppings, if desired.
tips: Let cauliflower marinate for 15 min before grilling to absorb flavours.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups mixed greens, 1⁄2 cup cooked grains, and 1⁄2 cup chickpeas.

products.name: Fajita Seasoning
summary: A lively, mild blend for seasoning beef, chicken, or fish fajitas & enchiladas.

products.name: Shish Kebab Seasoning
summary: Create restaurant-quality meals this summer with a Middle Eastern inspired blend infused with earthy and aromatic spices!

products.name: Teriyaki Dry Glaze
summary: A versatile blend with notes of garlic, ginger, and soy that works both as a glaze for grilling or a sauce!

products.name: Red Pepper Jelly (new)
summary: A sweet red pepper flavor with a mild heat from cayenne.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
